title: Order Management System - Complete Workflow
content:
# Order Management System - Complete Workflow

## Order Lifecycle States

### State Diagram
PENDING → CONFIRMED → PROCESSING → SHIPPED → DELIVERED → COMPLETED
              ↓            ↓           ↓
           CANCELLED   CANCELLED   RETURNED

## Detailed State Descriptions

### 1. PENDING
**Trigger:** Customer submits order, payment pending
**Duration:** Max 15 minutes
**Actions:**
- Inventory reserved (soft lock)
- Payment authorization initiated
- Order details captured

**Transitions:**
- → CONFIRMED: Payment successful
- → CANCELLED: Payment failed or user cancelled

### 2. CONFIRMED
**Trigger:** Payment successfully processed
**Duration:** 1-2 hours
**Actions:**
- Inventory hard-locked
- Order sent to warehouse queue
- Confirmation email sent to customer
- Order appears in customer's order history

**Transitions:**
- → PROCESSING: Warehouse picks up order
- → CANCELLED: Customer cancels within window

### 3. PROCESSING
**Trigger:** Warehouse begins order fulfillment
**Duration:** 4-24 hours
**Actions:**
- Items picked from warehouse
- Items packed
- Shipping label generated
- Packing slip included

**System Actions:**
- Update inventory (decrement stock)
- Allocate to specific warehouse location
- Generate pick list for warehouse staff

**Transitions:**
- → SHIPPED: Package handed to carrier
- → CANCELLED: Out of stock or fulfillment issue (rare)

### 4. SHIPPED
**Trigger:** Package handed to shipping carrier
**Duration:** 2-7 days (based on shipping method)
**Actions:**
- Tracking number assigned
- Shipping notification sent to customer
- Real-time tracking enabled
- Estimated delivery date calculated

**Tracking Updates:**
- In Transit
- Out for Delivery
- Delivery Attempted
- Held at Post Office

**Transitions:**
- → DELIVERED: Package successfully delivered
- → RETURNED: Delivery failed after multiple attempts

### 5. DELIVERED
**Trigger:** Carrier confirms delivery
**Duration:** Instant
**Actions:**
- Delivery confirmation sent to customer
- Customer can rate and review products
- Return window opens (30 days)

**Transitions:**
- → COMPLETED: After return window expires
- → RETURNED: Customer initiates return

### 6. COMPLETED
**Trigger:** Return window expires without return
**Duration:** Permanent
**Actions:**
- Order archived
- Final accounting reconciliation
- Customer loyalty points awarded

### 7. CANCELLED
**Trigger:** User or system cancels order
**Conditions:**
- Can cancel if order is PENDING or CONFIRMED
- Cannot cancel if already PROCESSING or SHIPPED
- Automatic cancellation if payment fails

**Actions:**
- Inventory reservation released
- Refund processed (if payment was captured)
- Cancellation email sent
- Reason for cancellation logged

### 8. RETURNED
**Trigger:** Customer initiates return within window
**Duration:** 7-14 days
**Actions:**
- Return authorization number (RAN) generated
- Return shipping label provided (if eligible)
- Warehouse notified of incoming return
- Quality inspection upon receipt
- Refund processed after inspection

## Special Cases

### Split Orders
When items ship from multiple warehouses:
- Each shipment has separate tracking
- Parent order remains in PROCESSING until all shipments complete
- Customer receives multiple shipping notifications

### Backorders
When item is out of stock:
- Customer notified of delay
- Option to cancel backorder
- Order remains in CONFIRMED state
- Shipped when inventory available

### Partial Cancellations
Customer can cancel individual items:
- Partial refund processed
- Remaining items continue fulfillment
- Order state based on remaining items

## Business Rules

### Cancellation Policy
- **PENDING/CONFIRMED**: Free cancellation
- **PROCESSING**: 50% restocking fee
- **SHIPPED**: Must wait for delivery, then return

### Return Policy
- 30-day return window
- Items must be unused and in original packaging
- Electronics: 14-day return window
- Final sale items: No returns

### Refund Processing Time
- Credit Card: 5-7 business days
- PayPal: 24-48 hours
- Store Credit: Instant

## System Integration Points

### Inventory System
- Reserve inventory (soft lock)
- Commit inventory (hard lock)
- Release inventory (cancellation)
- Decrement inventory (shipment)

### Payment Gateway
- Authorize payment
- Capture payment
- Void authorization
- Process refund

### Warehouse Management System (WMS)
- Send pick list
- Receive confirmation of shipment
- Update with tracking information

### Shipping Carriers
- Rate calculation
- Label generation
- Tracking updates (webhook)
- Delivery confirmation

### Customer Communication
- Email notifications at each state change
- SMS for delivery updates (if opted in)
- Push notifications (mobile app)

## Metrics and KPIs

### Performance Metrics
- Order processing time: <2 hours (CONFIRMED → PROCESSING)
- Fulfillment time: <24 hours (PROCESSING → SHIPPED)
- Delivery time: 2-7 days based on method
- Order accuracy: >99.5%
- Cancellation rate: <3%
- Return rate: <8%

### Customer Experience Metrics
- Order tracking usage: 75% of customers
- Customer satisfaction (post-delivery): >4.5/5
- Repeat purchase rate: >40%

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues
**Issue:** Order stuck in PENDING
**Cause:** Payment gateway timeout
**Solution:** Retry payment or cancel and reorder

**Issue:** Item not available after CONFIRMED
**Cause:** Inventory sync delay
**Solution:** Offer alternative or full refund

**Issue:** Tracking not updating
**Cause:** Carrier system delay
**Solution:** Contact carrier support, update customer
